00054 PyDoc_STRVAR(bpy_bm_new_doc,
00055 ".. method:: new()\n"
00056 "\n"
00057 "   :return: Return a new, empty BMesh.\n"
00058 "   :rtype: :class:`bmesh.types.BMesh`\n"
00059 );
00060 
00061 static PyObject *bpy_bm_new(PyObject *UNUSED(self))
00062 {
00063     BMesh *bm;
00064 
00065     bm = BM_mesh_create(&bm_mesh_allocsize_default);
00066 
00067     return BPy_BMesh_CreatePyObject(bm, BPY_BMFLAG_NOP);
00068 }
00069 
00070 PyDoc_STRVAR(bpy_bm_from_edit_mesh_doc,
00071 ".. method:: from_edit_mesh(mesh)\n"
00072 "\n"
00073 "   Return a BMesh from this mesh, currently the mesh must already be in editmode.\n"
00074 "\n"
00075 "   :return: the BMesh assosiated with this mesh.\n"
00076 "   :rtype: :class:`bmesh.types.BMesh`\n"
00077 );
00078 static PyObject *bpy_bm_from_edit_mesh(PyObject *UNUSED(self), PyObject *value)
00079 {
00080     BMesh *bm;
00081     Mesh *me = PyC_RNA_AsPointer(value, "Mesh");
00082 
00083     if (me == NULL) {
00084         return NULL;
00085     }
00086 
00087     if (me->edit_btmesh == NULL) {
00088         PyErr_SetString(PyExc_ValueError,
00089                         "The mesh must be in editmode");
00090         return NULL;
00091     }
00092 
00093     bm = me->edit_btmesh->bm;
00094 
00095     return BPy_BMesh_CreatePyObject(bm, BPY_BMFLAG_IS_WRAPPED);
00096 }
00097 
00098 static struct PyMethodDef BPy_BM_methods[] = {
00099     {"new",            (PyCFunction)bpy_bm_new,            METH_NOARGS,  bpy_bm_new_doc},
00100     {"from_edit_mesh", (PyCFunction)bpy_bm_from_edit_mesh, METH_O,       bpy_bm_from_edit_mesh_doc},
00101     {NULL, NULL, 0, NULL}
00102 };

00104 PyDoc_STRVAR(BPy_BM_doc,
00105 "This module provides access to blenders bmesh data structures.\n"
00106 "\n"
00107 "\n"
00108 "Submodules:\n"
00109 "\n"
00110 "* :mod:`bmesh.utils`\n"
00111 "* :mod:`bmesh.types`\n"
00112 "\n"
00113 "\n"
00114 ".. include:: include__bmesh.rst\n"
00115 );
00116 static struct PyModuleDef BPy_BM_module_def = {
00117     PyModuleDef_HEAD_INIT,
00118     "bmesh",  /* m_name */
00119     BPy_BM_doc,  /* m_doc */
00120     0,  /* m_size */
00121     BPy_BM_methods,  /* m_methods */
00122     NULL,  /* m_reload */
00123     NULL,  /* m_traverse */
00124     NULL,  /* m_clear */
00125     NULL,  /* m_free */
00126 };
00127 
00128 PyObject *BPyInit_bmesh(void)
00129 {
00130     PyObject *mod;
00131     PyObject *submodule;
00132     PyObject *sys_modules = PyThreadState_GET()->interp->modules;
00133 
00134     BPy_BM_init_types();
00135     BPy_BM_init_types_select();
00136     BPy_BM_init_types_customdata();
00137     BPy_BM_init_types_meshdata();
00138 
00139     mod = PyModule_Create(&BPy_BM_module_def);
00140 
00141     /* bmesh.types */
00142     PyModule_AddObject(mod, "types", (submodule = BPyInit_bmesh_types()));
00143     PyDict_SetItemString(sys_modules, PyModule_GetName(submodule), submodule);
00144     Py_INCREF(submodule);
00145 
00146     PyModule_AddObject(mod, "utils", (submodule = BPyInit_bmesh_utils()));
00147     PyDict_SetItemString(sys_modules, PyModule_GetName(submodule), submodule);
00148     Py_INCREF(submodule);
00149 
00150     return mod;
00151 }
